text: haqtaH ShO#DaqSaBi#rBOqgaira#sinAqth sa EqtAmaqgnayE&nI#kavataq Ahu#timapaSyaqt tAma#juhOqt tasyAqgniranI# kavAqnthsvEna# BAgaqdhEyE#na prIqtaH ShO#DaSaqdhA vRuqtrasya# BOqgAnapya#dahad-vaiSvakarmaqNEna# pAqpmanOq nira#mucyataq yadaqgnayE&nI#kavataq Ahu#tiM juqhOtyaqgnirEqvA-&syAnI#kavAqnthsvEna# BAgaqdhEyE#na prIqtaH pAqpmAnaqmapi# dahati vaiSvakarmaqNEna# pAqpmanOq nirmu#cyatEq yaM kAqmayE#ta ciqraM pAqpmanOq - [  ] 22
